Interface ncsa.hdf.object.FileFormat

public interface FileFormat
This FileFormat defines general I/O accessing interface to file resources, such as open/close file, and retrieve the file structure.

Version:
1.0 12/12/2001
Author:
Peter X. Cao, NCSA

close()
Closes access to the file resource.
getFilePath()
Returns the full path of the file: file path + file name.
getRootNode()
Returns the root node of the file.
open()
Opens access to the file resource and returns the file identifier.

open
public int open() throws java.lang.Exception
          Opens access to the file resource and returns the file identifier. If the file is already open, it returns the file access identifier.

Returns:
the file access identifier if opening the file is succsessful; otherwise returns a negative value.
close
public void close() throws java.lang.Exception
          Closes access to the file resource.
getRootNode
public javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode getRootNode()
          Returns the root node of the file. The root node contains the hierarchy of the file.
getFilePath
public java.lang.String getFilePath()
          Returns the full path of the file: file path + file name.
